title: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun 2nd Season
synopsis: After many trials and tribulations, Iruma Suzuki is finally happily living among demons despite having to hide his true identity as a human. Even more so, he has now found his ambition in life: keep ranking up in this world!
characters: ['Azazel, Amelie', 'Suzuki, Iruma', 'Valac, Clara', 'Asmodeus, Alice', 'Naberius, Kalego', 'Opera', 'Sullivan', 'Ami, Kirio', 'Crocell, Kerori', 'Shichirou, Baramu']
